==Info==
gpsd is available through the synaptic package manager, so there's no need to compile from source. Currently using the python-gps package for testing purposes. The gpsfake program is included, which allows you to test gpsd without a GPS device attached to your machine.
=== Links ===
[http://gpsd.berlios.de/ gpsd homepage] - service daemon that can interface with a GPS device and make the data available to be queried on a TCP port.
